issue.title: Python: Support reading a column-selection from Parquet files
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-361](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-361). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Instead of reading the whole file, only read a selection of columns.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-361?focusedCommentId=15642416) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
Issue resolved by pull request 197
